definition: to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: All exhibitors are welcome to take part in the International Competition and Awarding held by the organizer.
sentences.chinese: 所有参展方均可参与西安世园会国际竞赛及评奖。

sentences.english: Ponson, distinguished for seascapes, took part in salons since 1861.
sentences.chinese: 彭松以描绘海景著称，1861年起在巴黎沙龙参展。

sentences.english: People put great effort into their products and exhibits in the hope of winning an award.
sentences.chinese: 人们在参展品上花很多工夫，希望赢得奖项。

sentences.english: Raw Space Exhibitors have to carpet, design and construct their own floor space.
sentences.chinese: 展览光地参展商须自行设计及盖建展位，并铺上地毯。

sentences.english: Organization of 257 companies in our province, a total of 646 booths.
sentences.chinese: 我省组织了257家企业参展，共有展位646个。

sentences.english: For oversea exhibitors, we will send the Admission Ticket by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 主办单位将会以空邮寄出入场券予海外参展商。
动漫电玩节共吸引了170家参展商。

sentences.english: He met Ai Weiwei when they both exhibited at a show in Finland.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰的一个秀场，他遇见同来参展的艾。

sentences.english: Will you join the Chinese exhibitor group go to FOE?
sentences.chinese: 你会随中国参展团出发吗？

sentences.english: Besides, there are also encouraging responses from some well-known enterprises of small electric appliances of the Yangtze River Delta region.
sentences.chinese: 此外，长三角地区域著名小家电企业亦踊跃参展。

sentences.english: PINZHI attends the furniture fair in Longjiang with its "RUBY M" and "NORSON FAMILY" brand every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年龙江家具展览会“品至”都组织旗下品牌参展。

sentences.english: Yup. We are one of the exhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，我们是参展厂商之一。

sentences.english: Fascia 300mm(H) standard fascia board with booth number and exhibitor's name in both Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 公司招牌参展商中英文名称及摊位号码招牌。

sentences.english: The best machines were selected and sent to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 最好的机器被选去参展了。

sentences.english: What's more, we learned a lot from other exhibitors .
sentences.chinese: 另外，我们从其他参展者身上学到很多东西。

sentences.english: Many exhibitors have even printed out pamphlets written in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 许多参展商甚至打印出用中文写的宣传小册。

definition: relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
domestic and international/at home and abroad
